item.title: 成功发布 SU7 后，小米成为中国第八大电动汽车新贵
item.description: 据行业数据显示，中国智能手机制造商小米已成为中国第八大电动汽车新贵，其首款车型SU7轿车4月份销量超过7000辆。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi has become the country's eighth-largest electric vehicle upstart after selling more than 7,000 units of its first model, the SU7 sedan, in April, according to industry data.】

item.title: 美国通胀报告公布前股市上涨，美元走低
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市上涨，美元走低，原因是交易商权衡了好坏参半的美国生产者物价数据，并为当天晚些时候可能影响美联储近期政策路径的至关重要的消费者物价报告做好准备。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Wednesday while the dollar drifted lower as traders weighed mixed U.S. producer price data and braced for the crucial consumer price report later in the day that is likely to influence the Federal Reserve's near-term policy path.】

item.title: 索尼股价大涨 12%，原因是回购和分红计划以及利润展望的提高
item.description: 索尼集团承诺提高股东回报率，并预计在图像传感器业务的推动下，年度利润将有所增长，此后该公司股价在周三的东京早盘交易中大涨 12%。【原文：Shares in Sony Group jumped 12% in early Tokyo trading on Wednesday after the company pledged to boost shareholder returns and forecast higher annual profit with a boost from its image sensors business.】

item.title: 聚焦：华为中国旗舰店激增预示着与苹果的对决
item.description: 华为正在改革其零售战略，并积极在中国开设旗舰店，其中一些与苹果商店仅咫尺之遥，以求在全球最大的智能手机市场重新夺回高端电子产品的宝座。【原文：Huawei is revamping its retail strategy and aggressively opening flagship stores in China, with some just a stone's throw away from Apple shops, as it seeks to retake the premium electronics throne in the world's biggest smartphone market.】

item.title: 美元在关键的 CPI 测试前下跌；日元承压
item.description: 周三，美元兑欧元汇率接近一个月低点，国债收益率走低，交易员们在为当天晚些时候可能决定美联储政策走向的一份关键的美国通胀报告做准备。【原文：The dollar traded near a one-month low versus the euro on Wednesday amid lower Treasury yields as traders braced for a key U.S. inflation report later in the day that could dictate the path of Federal Reserve policy.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司首席执行官提出辞职，在美上市股票暴跌
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）表示，该公司首席执行官周二提出下台，投资者担心该公司可能受到更多政治干预，导致股价下滑。【原文：The chief executive of Brazilian state-run oil company Petrobras offered to step down on Tuesday, the company said, sending shares sliding as investors braced for the possibility of more political interference at the firm.】

item.title: 油价因加拿大野火和美国库存减少预期而上涨
item.description: 周三早盘，油价上涨，原因是加拿大的油砂受到大面积野火的威胁，而且市场预计美国原油和汽油库存将在当天晚些时候出现下降。【原文：Oil prices rose in early trade on Wednesday as large wildfires were threatening Canada's oil sands and as the market expected U.S. crude oil and gasoline inventories to show a drawdown later in the day.】

item.title: 美联储施密德表示准备对政策保持耐心
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰弗里-施密德（Jeffrey Schmid）周二表示，通胀率仍然过高，美国央行要做更多的工作来降低通胀率，这表明他支持在一段时间内保持美联储政策利率的稳定。【原文：Inflation is still too high, and the U.S. central bank has more work to do to bring it down, Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank President Jeffrey Schmid said on Tuesday, a signal that he supports keeping the Fed's policy rate steady for some time.】

item.title: 纽约银行将向摩根大通出售近 50 亿美元的抵押贷款仓库贷款
item.description: 陷入困境的地区性贷款机构纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）周二表示，已同意向摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）出售约 50 亿美元的抵押仓库贷款。【原文：Embattled regional lender New York Community Bancorp said on Tuesday it has agreed to sell about $5 billion in mortgage warehouse loans to JPMorgan Chase .】

item.title: 数字银行 Chime 在预期的首次公开募股前首次推出预支工资产品
item.description: 美国数字银行 Chime 正在推出一款产品，允许客户在发薪日之前动用最多 500 美元的工资，这是一家金融科技公司进军快速增长的 "工资收入动用 "市场的最新举措。【原文：U.S. digital bank Chime is launching a product that will allow customers to access up to $500 of their wages before payday, the latest move by a financial technology company to enter the fast-growing "earned wage access" market.】

item.title: 美国称波音违反 2021 年 737 MAX 延期起诉协议
item.description: 美国司法部周二晚些时候表示，波音公司违反了 2021 年协议中的义务，该协议规定波音公司在 2018 年和 2019 年 737 MAX 致命坠机事故中免于刑事起诉。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department said late on Tuesday that Boeing Co had breached its obligations in a 2021 agreement that shielded the planemaker from criminal prosecution over fatal 737 MAX crashes in 2018 and 2019.】

item.title: 美国银行业监管机构宣布于 7 月 19 日就 Capital One-Discover 交易召开公开会议
item.description: 美国两家银行监管机构周二宣布，他们将于 7 月 19 日召开一次公开会议，就 Capital One Financial Corporation 收购 Discover Financial Services 的提议征求意见。【原文：A pair of U.S. banking regulators announced on Tuesday they would be hosting a public meeting on July 19 to solicit input on the proposed acquisition of Discover Financial Services by Capital One Financial Corporation .】

item.title: 电动汽车初创企业 Canoo 第一季度亏损超预期
item.description: 电动汽车初创公司Canoo周二公布的第一季度亏损额超过预期，但对全年的展望保持不变。【原文：Electric vehicle startup Canoo posted a larger-than-expected loss for the first quarter on Tuesday, but kept its outlook for the year unchanged.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场活跃，但对 CPI 和关税保持警惕
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: MSCI 公布季度指数审查结果
item.description: 指数提供商摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）周二表示，在进行季度审查后，其广受关注的摩根士丹利资本国际 ACWI 指数将增加 42 种证券，并剔除 121 种证券。【原文：Index provider MSCI said on Tuesday that 42 securities will be added and 121 securities removed from its widely followed MSCI ACWI index following its quarterly review.】

item.title: 美国联邦法院执行证交会传唤埃隆-马斯克的传票
item.description: 周二的一份法庭文件显示，一家联邦法院要求埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）必须在美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）对其以 440 亿美元收购推特（Twitter）的调查中再次作证。【原文：A federal court said that Elon Musk must testify again in the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's investigation into his $44 billion takeover of Twitter, according to a court filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国口罩和手套制造商获得救命稻草：对中国制造产品征收更高的关税
item.description: 乔-拜登总统对中国商品加征关税的举措应有助于美国的医用口罩和手套制造商。【原文：President Joe Biden’s move to hike tariffs on Chinese goods should help U.S.-based medical mask and glove makers, a sector that has largely flamed out after surging during the COVID-19 pandemic.】

item.title: 3M 股东在年度会议上投票否决高管薪酬方案
item.description: 3M 公司周二表示，包括前首席执行官迈克-罗曼在内的某些高管的年度薪酬方案没有获得必要数量的股东赞成票。【原文：3M said on Tuesday that the annual compensation packages of certain executives, including that of former CEO Mike Roman, did not receive the requisite number of favorable shareholder votes, on an advisory basis.】

item.title: 拜登的新中国关税墙面临通过墨西哥和越南流失的问题
item.description: 拜登政府对中国电动汽车和其他战略行业征收新关税的目的是保护美国制造业的未来，但这很可能会加速中国生产向墨西哥、越南和其他地方转移，以规避关税。【原文：The Biden administration's new tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles and other strategic sectors aim to protect the future of U.S. manufacturing, but they will likely accelerate a shift of Chinese production to Mexico, Vietnam and elsewhere to avoid them.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，本田将在中国裁员 1700 人
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周三报道，由于在全球第二大经济体的销量下滑，本田汽车正在缩减其在中国的全职生产员工人数，迄今已有约1700名员工同意离开。【原文：Honda Motor is scaling down its full-time production workforce in China, with roughly 1,700 employees having agreed to leave thus far, as sales in the world's second-largest economy decline, the Nikkei reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道联合国专家称朝鲜三月份清洗了 1.475 亿美元被盗加密货币
item.description: 路透社周二看到的联合国制裁监督员的机密工作显示，朝鲜在去年从一家加密货币交易所窃取 1.475 亿美元后，于 3 月份通过虚拟货币平台龙卷风现金进行了洗钱。【原文：North Korea laundered $147.5 million through virtual currency platform Tornado Cash in March after stealing it last year from a cryptocurrency exchange, according to confidential work by United Nations sanctions monitors seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）格伦伯格将设立办公室解决工作场所行为问题
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation）负责人计划告诉国会，他将成立一个新的、独立的办公室，专门负责职业操守问题，因为一项外部审查发现，在他的领导下，美国银行监管机构的员工受到了全面的虐待。【原文：The head of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation plans to tell Congress he will establish a new, independent office devoted to professional conduct after an external review found comprehensive mistreatment of employees at the U.S. bank regulator under his watch.】

item.title: 美国小型企业担心 TikTok 禁用，因为它刺激了销售额
item.description: Paul Tran 和妻子 Lynda 共同创立的护肤品牌在 TikTok 上走红后，一切都发生了改变。【原文：Everything changed for Paul Tran and his wife Lynda when the skincare brand they co-founded went viral on TikTok.】

item.title: TikTok 创作者提起诉讼，以阻止美国的撤资或禁令法
item.description: 一群 TikTok 的创作者周二表示，他们向美国联邦法院提起诉讼，寻求阻止乔-拜登总统签署的一项法律，该法律将强制剥离 1.7 亿美国人使用的短视频应用程序或禁止其使用。【原文：A group of TikTok creators said Tuesday they filed suit in U.S. federal court seeking to block a law signed by President Joe Biden that would force the divestiture of the short video app used by 170 million Americans or ban it.】

item.title: 美国机构解决对 America Movil 水下电缆系统的调查
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）周二表示，已经解决了对连接美国与哥伦比亚和哥斯达黎加的 America Movil 海底电缆系统的两项调查。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) said on Tuesday it has resolved two investigations into the America Movil Submarine Cable System that connects the United States to Colombia and Costa Rica.】

item.title: 比亚迪美洲区负责人称年底前确定墨西哥工厂选址
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪的美洲区负责人周二表示，该公司预计将于2024年底在墨西哥选址建厂，年产量将达15万辆。【原文：Chinese electric auto maker BYD expects to have chosen a site to build a plant in Mexico, where it will put out up to 150,000 cars a year, by the end of 2024, the firm's Americas head said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国议员敦促调解委员会帮助空乘人员达成劳资协议
item.description: 周二，160 多名美国众议院议员敦促全国调解委员会（NMB）采取措施，帮助约 8 万名空乘人员达成新的合同协议。【原文：More than 160 U.S. House lawmakers on Tuesday urged the National Mediation Board (NMB) to take steps to help about 80,000 flight attendants reach new contract deals.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，索尼重新考虑对派拉蒙的竞购
item.description: 据 CNBC 周二援引消息人士的话报道，索尼影业公司正在重新考虑对派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）的竞购，导致这家美国媒体公司的股价下跌超过 7%。【原文：Sony Pictures is rethinking its bid for Paramount Global , CNBC reported on Tuesday, citing sources, sending the shares of the U.S. media company down more than 7%.】

item.title: 拜登提高美国对中国进口产品的关税
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登周二宣布对包括电动汽车（EV）电池、计算机芯片和医疗产品在内的一系列中国进口产品大幅提高关税。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden on Tuesday unveiled steep tariff increases on an array of Chinese imports, including electric vehicle (EV) batteries, computer chips and medical products.】

item.title: 负责实施银行重组的花旗高管离职
item.description: 路透社周二看到的一份内部备忘录显示，花旗集团负责实施全面重组计划的高管蒂尔-科尔（Titi Cole）即将离职。【原文：Citigroup's Titi Cole, a top executive in charge of implementing its sweeping restructuring plan, is leaving the bank, an internal memo seen by Reuters showed on Tuesday.】
